root.mailContent:
Dear <%firstName%><%lastName%>,

As per the requesed raised we are hereby to inform your team. we deleted the Customer Information for your Operator Id: <%userId%>.



Please find attached document, for your further communication. Kindly note that the attachments are password protected. To open the attachment, kindly enter your DOB as YYYYMMDD i.e. 12/04/2021 as 20210412


If you wish to contact us for any further clarifications, please e-mail us at xxxx or call XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX within UAE or XXXXXXXXXXXXX from outside UAE.



Sincerely,
Bank Admin Department
www.OA-ADMIN.com
